annotation_sentence: Ah, yes. Um, I look for good price on this, how to say... bag?

annotation_sentence: This one! It is very... um, beautiful. But, price is... uh, high?

annotation_sentence: Maybe... um, little less? Like, how to say... discount?

annotation_sentence: Ah, still little high. Maybe, um, can do twenty percent?

annotation_sentence: Thank you! You very kind. I will take this one.
